name: Pho
description: Rich Vietnamese broth, rice noodle, bok choy, jalapeno, carrot, cilantro, lime, Thai basil, housemade hoisin, and sambal chili.

name: Classic
description: House blend greens, carrot, cucumber, red onion, tomato, hard-boiled egg, crouton, and buttermilk herb dressing.

name: Sesame Ginger
description: Bok choy, spinach, golden raisin, sunflower seed, artichoke heart, carrot, red onion, and sesame ginger vinaigrette.

name: The Rocks Noodle Salad
description: Rice noodles with Chinese vinaigrette, grilled wild-caught Montana lake trout, roasted beets, bok choy, carrot, jalapeno, cucumber, hard-boiled egg, green onion, cilantro, and Thai basil.

name: Baked and Breaded Amalthia Chevre
description: Spinach and arugula, strawberry, candied pecan, caramelized onion, and lemon mustard dressing.

name: Hummus
description: Baked naan, house-pickled vegetables, roasted garlic, and cucumber.

name: Charcuterie
description: Locally sourced smoked and cured meats, gourmet cheeses, baked baguettes, and various accouterments.

name: Margarita Flatbread
description: Plum tomato, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

name: Bison Blue Flatbread
description: Bison loin, buttermilk blue, roasted garlic, red onion, sundried tomato, spinach.

name: Taco Flatbread
description: Cumin chicken, cilantro, queso fresco, green olive, pico de gallo, corn tortilla.

name: Florentine Flatbread
description: Spinach, artichoke, parmesan, and Roma tomato.

name: Bison Mushroom Flatbread
description: Bison loin, wild mushroom, caramelized onion, parmesan, and arugula.

name: Thai Flatbread
description: Kurobuta pork belly, jalapeno, cilantro, gingered carrot, sunflower seed, cucumber, coconut, and chili cream.
